attributes.additional_details: If fireworks were only accessible to professionals and organisations this would be so beneficial for a lot of animal owners, dogs are being drugged and sedated to calm them, horses kicking in their stables, cats having fireworks thrown at them, not to mention the poor wildlife that have no where to hide.
attributes.background: Stop the sale of fireworks. Only allow them to be used at organised events. Make silent fireworks more available. Stop animals and wildlife suffering.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700013
